data.nrql: SELECT PERCENTAGE(COUNT(*), WHERE (volume_utilization IS NULL OR volume_utilization < 1)) AS 'Health Score' FROM netapp_solidfire_volume FACET netapp_solidfire_volume_name
SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_solidfire_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_solidfire_volume FACET netapp_solidfire_cluster_name

presentation.title: Cluster Distribution
presentation.notes: The parent Cluster of this Volume

data.nrql: SELECT uniqueCount(netapp_solidfire_volume_name) AS 'Volumes' FROM netapp_solidfire_volume FACET status

presentation.title: Status Distribution
presentation.notes: The current status of the volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(volume_utilization) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Volume Utilization
presentation.notes: A floating value that describes how much the client is using the volume. Possible values: 0: The client is not using the volume 1: The client is using their maximum. >1: The client is using their burst

data.nrql: SELECT sum(size) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO
SELECT average(read_latency) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Latency (Microseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time, in microseconds, to complete read operations to the volume in the last 500 milliseconds.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_latency) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Latency (Microseconds)
presentation.notes: The average time, in microseconds, to complete write operations to a volume in the last 500 milliseconds.

data.nrql: SELECT average(read_operations_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Read Operations (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: The total read operations to the volume since the creation of the volume.

data.nrql: SELECT average(write_operations_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Write Operations (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: The total cumulative write operations to the volume since the creation of the volume.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(reads_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Reads (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The total cumulative bytes read from the volume since the creation of the volume.

data.nrql: SELECT sum(writes_rate) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Writes (Bytes per Second)
presentation.notes: The total cumulative bytes written to the volume since the creation of the volume

data.nrql: SELECT average(actual_iops) FROM netapp_solidfire_volume COMPARE WITH 1 WEEK AGO TIMESERIES AUTO

presentation.title: Actual IOPS (Operations per Second)
presentation.notes: The current actual IOPS to the volume in the last 500 milliseconds.
